title: [DEPRECATED] Rush Hour Routes
description: Deprecation warning (November 2021): This dataset was part of a program that is now inactive. As such, we no longer actively maintain it but it remains present for historical reference. A. SUMMARY This dataset shows routes that the City has targeted for congestion mitigation. The four focus intervention methods are: (1) working with construction projects, (2) limiting double parking, (3) working with delivery trucks, and (4) the 'Don't Block the Box' public awareness program. For more information regarding the City's Rush Hour Congestion Strategy please see the press release from May 14, 2015 in the Attachments section below. B. METHODOLOGY Line geometry generated based on roadway centerlines. C. UPDATE FREQUENCY No regular updates D. OTHER CRITICAL INFO N/A

columns.name: NHOOD
columns.description: neighborhood the street segment is in
